questions.question: What is FundmyWish?
questions.answer: FundmyWish is a heartfelt platform where asking for help feels natural, not awkward. It empowers you to share your wishlist and connect with friends, family, or compassionate strangers who want to make a difference. We’re here to create a safe, supportive space where kindness meets dignity, making it easy to give and receive help.

questions.question: Who can use FundmyWish?
questions.answer: Anyone in need of support or looking to help others can use the platform. Whether you're fundraising for personal needs, a gift, or a cause, FundmyWish is here to connect you with supporters.

questions.question: Is FundmyWish free to use?
questions.answer: Yes, signing up and creating a wishlist is free. However, small transaction fees may apply to cover payment processing costs.

questions.question: How do I create a wishlist?
questions.answer: Simply sign up, log into your account, and click on the 'Create' button. Add items, provide details, and share your wishlist with friends, family, or the public.

questions.question: Who can see my wishlist?
questions.answer: You can choose your visibility settings when creating a wishlist. It can be shared privately with select individuals or publicly to reach a broader audience.

questions.question: What kind of wishes can I add?
questions.answer: You can add items or monetary goals for personal needs, education, medical bills, gifts, or any legitimate cause.

questions.question: Can my businesses partner with FundmyWish?
questions.answer: Absolutely! We welcome partnerships with businesses or organizations looking to make a difference. Contact us at support@ovko.org for more details.

questions.question: What is the collaboration with Neko Village Store?
questions.answer: We partner with Neko Village Store to offer exclusive wishlist items and discounts for wish creators and contributors.

questions.question: What if my wishlist isn’t fulfilled?
questions.answer: If your wishlist doesn’t reach its goal, you will still receive any partial contributions made. You can also extend or adjust your wishlist as needed.
